item.title: CVE-2020-7389|2024-09-16T16:53:13.741Z -- sage -- x3
item.description: Sage X3 System CHAINE Variable Script Command Injection. An authenticated user with developer access can pass OS commands via this variable used by the web application. Note, this developer configuration should not be deployed in production.
